txt.en: Summon and defeat Akashpug, Chief of Târ Stazg
Summon and defeat Râkhuga the Tracker
Summon and defeat Râkhuga the Tracker
The Uruk Logon was sent to Glâd Ereg with a company of Wood-trolls to bring the forest beneath the White Hand of Saruman.
Fauldush is a warlord of a strange and powerful breed of Orc who serve Saruman the White: the Uruk-hai.
Shatogtar, a warlord of the Uruk-hai, once led the forces of the White Hand at Barad Morlas.
The defeat of Pizumu the Spy-master will greatly hinder Saruman's efforts in Eregion.
Gâmzhurm the Uruk is the driving force behind the Dunlendings who occupy the encampment of Porth Cadlus. It is the fear of this beast that keeps them from returning to their homes.
The half-orcs of Târ Stazg will fall into disarray without the leadership of Akashpug.
Râkhuga was the leader of the Scouts of Saruman seeking after the One Ring in Eregion. His death will be a mighty blow to the White Hand.
Summon and defeat Gâmzhurm, Lord of Porth Cadlus
